displaySettings.titleBarText: Zona H051 - Sensores de Fogo e Gás

caption.caption: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

animateColor.expression: If ({#1.Sts.Falha} AND (NOT {#1.Sts.Atuado}))Then 0 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#3" ) <> 0) AND {#1.Sts.Atuado}) Then 1 Else If ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#3" ) <> 0) AND {#1.Sts.Atuado}) Then 2 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#3" ) == 0) AND (AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#3" ) == 0) AND (NOT {#1.Sts.Falha})) Then 3 Else 4

vbaItem.vbaCode:
Private Sub Display_AnimationStart()
On Error GoTo ErrHandler
Dim VAC_EQP As String
VAC_EQP = Text1.Caption PONTEIRO = Mid(VAC_EQP, 3, 1)
If PONTEIRO = "-" Then VAC_EQP_TIPO = Left(VAC_EQP, 2) VAC_EQP_NUMERO = Mid(VAC_EQP, 4, 7) Else VAC_EQP_TIPO = Left(VAC_EQP, 3) VAC_EQP_NUMERO = Mid(VAC_EQP, 5, 7) End If
AlarmEventSummary1.FilterDefinition = " EventSource LIKE '" & VAC_EQP_TIPO & "' And EventSource LIKE '" & VAC_EQP_NUMERO & "'"
FactoryTalkAlarmandEventLogViewer1.WhereClause = " SourceName LIKE '%" & VAC_EQP_TIPO & "%' And SourceName LIKE '%" & VAC_EQP_NUMERO & "%'"
Exit Sub ErrHandler:
End Sub
